content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Address

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

MONNARD Spedition GmbH
Eduard-Suling-Straße 13
D-28217 Bremen
Phone: +49 (0)421/ 322 65-0
Fax: +49 (0)421/ 322 65-75
E-Mail: spedition@monnard.com

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Contact us

[/vc_column_text]

    Phone: +49 (0)421/ 322 65-0
    E-Mail: carsten.borchardt@monnard.com

    When contacting us, you agree that your data will be processed. Click here to read the privacy policy.


    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1573047475130{margin-top: -25px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”45px”][vc_column_text]

    Contact Persons

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]For a direct line and target oriented advice: Your personal contact.[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1638351576885{background-color: #eeeeee !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” el_id=”refreshmap” el_class=”buttonbackbar” css=”.vc_custom_1541160663090{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1540904652188{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1540902261879{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”homemap”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
